If I could rate it mixed I would. I wouldn't recommend it, but it is a free game so there is no cost to trying it.
TLDR: The game is well made but not very well thought out.

The worst aspect of the game is the Class/Hero/Character design. The balance philosophy for the game seems to me and many others to be "If everything is overpowered, nothing is" and that is true from a literal standpoint but what that results in is a game that feels very polarizing. You either blow someone up or they blow you up. It is almost never so simple but a lot of matchups where it feels really hopeless. But balance is difficult to determine for sure in such a short amount of time and relatively easy to fix.

What sucks the most about the character design is the abilities themselves. Lot of characters feel like they just had things thrown at them for the sake of filling out their kit. Which cannot be easily solved through balance patches. Maybe they are faithful to their source material but very few characters have a cohesive and complimentary kit to their playstyle and it makes it difficult to determine what exactly they are supposed to be doing. Rocket is the example that immediately sticks in my mind. He has a machine gun with a small, shared clip with a healing orb secondary. He has a two charge jetpack, a wall climb and a deployable that drops overhealth pickups and revives someone automatically. What exactly is the goal here with this character? Use your mobility to get to high ground and tickle enemies while occasionally reviving people? I seriously have no idea what the vision here was besides there wasn't any.

Then you have the teamwork mechanic which is a great idea. But poorly implemented and suffers from an idealistic perception on how people actually behave. Most of the teamup mechanics are just little buffs that artificially introduce synergy in character kits. Scarlet Witch and Magneto don't have synergistic abilities but the Witch gives Magneto a new ability so Magnetos want a Witch. Not to say they are all just simple buffs. Jeff/Rocket can ride Groot like a mount and Hulk can throw Wolverine. Which are fun ideas. But what happens in a multiplayer game when someone gets a benefit based on your choices? "Hey you, swap." Already on day one I have had numerous games in casual of people toxically or not pressuring people to swap because they want to get the benefit from a certain character when it is not mutual. This will only get worse as the casual players naturally leave, leaving only the people who really care behind.

All of this about character design is to say that I don't think the characters lend themselves well to having staying power. This is quantity over quality and the only way they are going to be able to keep people invested into new characters if they come out extremely quickly. Which is fine but none of the characters feel very good to play. They are all just meh and that is in my opinion a pretty catastrophic failure for a hero shooter.


Monetization and progression is another thing that bugs me. The game received a lot of praise for things it was going to do well. Battlepasses that don't expire, very good. Free currency earned through events that can be converted to premium currency at a 1:1 ratio. Very good. But what they didn't say is that the prices of the skins are still going to range in the 15-20 dollar range and that the free currency from events is kind of a mixed bag too. To complete the events you often need to be playing certain characters which is problematic enough if you didn't like characters. So now to get something for a character you want you have to do what may feel like chores. But on top of that those challenges ALSO require someone on your team to be playing another hero so that you can get those previously mentioned teamwork mechanics. Of course there is no challenge to encourage people to play that Hero so that it is actually done. So the game actively encourages you to be annoying and ask people to play characters so that you get a benefit. This kind of garbage feels terrible and discouraging in every game that has ever tried it. IT DOES NOT WORK. So in reality the monitization doesn't actually differ that much from the likes of Overwatch which is already pretty bad. Being marginally better than crap is not good.


Onto more minor things or things I couldn't fit in the above yap session: The UI inside and outside the game is kind of confusion. NetEase has done the impossible and incorporated unskippable cutscenes in a multiplayer only hero shooter which is kind of impressive. Even if they were all skippable (and most are for some reason) after I have seen it, I don't want to see it again. The characters' dialog is pretty annoying and could be described as 'yapping'. With their constant cringe worthy quips. I don't feel like any character in this game has said anything worth hearing but they talk constantly and drowns out important gameplay related voice clips. The maps are very pretty but beyond aesthetic I couldn't tell you a thing about any of their layouts. I couldn't find a spot in the character design area but many characters have ultimates that either make them extremely tanky or invincible for seemingly no reason. Getting killed should be part of the counterplay and is often the only way for certain characters to fight back. Character's like Jeff have ultimates that are pretty much impossible to react to and once you are got, you can't do anything to get out until it expires or Jeff jumps off the cliff with you 7 seconds later. The game is generally just extremely disorienting with the lack of useful information you are given as your screen fills with particle effects. Etc, etc.


The game is well made though. For once a game actually launches without a mountain of game breaking bugs and server issues. Apart from performance issues that have been plaguing some people. The developers tried. It is a pretty game, it controls well and feels well but because of the way it was actually designed it holds itself back. My enjoyment of the game falls with each match and I am stopping now before it gets tainted too negatively. The game has a future but not for me.

先说一下优点
美术质量可以说放眼全球都属于第一梯队，对于一个主打竞技的网游来说这年头可不容易，在还原漫画的基础上有重新设计了更具有风格化的造型，场景算是比较有细节的，对比网易他们自家的永劫无间来说要好得多，比如东京那张地图的涂鸦和环境音效，你能感觉得美工确实非常发力，至少你不会体验永劫无间那种死气沉沉的空洞地图。
每个人物包括皮肤的赛后结算动画可以说都是经过设计过的，最后定格的漫画效果可以说非常出色。如果游戏日后运营的下去，并且效果不错，我们可能会看到漫威宇宙当中一大堆的皮肤，角色，地图，通行证毕竟漫威是出了名能水漫画，水设定的娱乐文化公司（想必网易购买版权，估计也是行了这个方便）0
关于玩法与核心机制
人物的技能如果说是抄袭OW，那可以说是对本作的偏见，仅第三人称这一点就与OW有着明显差异，比如蜘蛛侠与毒液这两对冤家的飞荡效果，和类似包括金刚狼与秘客的近战玩法。但不得不否认的是我们仍然会看到蜘蛛侠上勾拳，仓鼠球毒液，西格玛万磁王。
核心玩法上没什么多说的，经典的占点与推车，以及类似OW式的英雄射击对抗。（当然司马的ELO机制是这款游戏的匹配机制，如果你是竞技模式玩家那只能说你有福了，你会赢五把输五把，极其恶臭保证玩家时长的方式，在必赢的局划水都能赢，在必输的局，你补位+绝活也盘不活。当然最恶心的就是没有限制位置，在必输局当中好几次队友拿出4C以及5C的情况，场面极其抽象。）
说了优点该看缺点了
过于花哨的技能效果
在混乱的团战当中很难确立视觉中心，这一部分原因可能由于漫画渲染的缘故，我觉得参考守望先锋，可以加入一定的写实化的技能特效，部分角色技能限制CD，或者着重强调普通攻击与近战攻击的重要性会有很大缓解，不然混乱的团战粒子特效以及玩家无法获取准确的信息判断会很影响游戏的竞技性
很难相信主打第三人称动作的竞技游戏，竟然没有翻阅台阶这个设计，我们仍然要像传统FPS一样一个格子一个格子的跳上去，尤其是游玩高机动性人物的时候这极大的破坏了人物动作的流畅性。要明白这并非一个第一人称游戏，人物的动作玩家们都清晰可见。

无论你释放了什么技能，或者什么样的攻击你都有一种刀片砍柴，老奶奶踩棉花，打火机点湿柴火的无力感。近战干瘪远程泼水，无论是音效还是命中反馈都是这样，钢铁侠的大招像是发射注水卵，惩罚者的大招像是尿不尽。
可能是刚玩的缘故，但是你这血包放的位置也过于抽象了，还有一些唐氏空气墙简直就是恶心人。

Honestly, I've been thoroughly enjoying Marvel Rivals! The game's graphics are simply stunning and combat can be incredibly fun and unique. There's a lot of exciting picks in terms of the playable characters and they all stand out as their own, keeping each match feeling fresh with diverse faces and mechanics. The game modes are quite fun and are fast-paced at times, especially if the team can utilise the potential of their selected heroes!

As much as I love this game however, I do feel that some characters are noticeably unbalanced (looking at you, Iron Fist and the two sniper class characters), creating frustrating experiences when one or two enemies dominate the entire team. I feel just a couple of tweaks and different approaches to a few game design decisions, plus some nerfs could make the combat feel more fair and make the game even more enjoyable, instead of the frustration brought on by annoying encounters. Furthermore, there definitely needs to be attention in regards to optimisation, I and many other players have had issues with frame rates and loading and crashes. Tuning down the graphics and reinstalling on the SSD solved most of the issues personally, but this shouldn't be required at all to have a quality experience.

Overall, Marvel Rivals is a fantastic hero shooter and a fantastic game in general, just a couple updates improving game optimisation and balance and honestly? This could become one of my top 5 favourite games of all time!

アビリティやバランス調整、その他いくつかの点における某ゲームとの棲み分け

まず、本作はゲームとしてのクオリティは非常に高いと感じます。派手な演出、爽快感、IPの知名度やカッコよさ、どこをとっても一級品の大作といえると思います。なのでその辺の話は割愛して、本作のゲーム性のオリジナリティの観点のみに絞ってOverWatchをそこそこ長くプレイしている身としての感想を以下にまとめます。
他の方もおっしゃっている通り、TPSであることを除けばゲームルールやシステムデザインはOverWatchと完全に同一です。
一方で、実際のプレイ感覚はOWとの差異を覚える点がいくつかありました。以下の通りです。


本作はOWと同じヒーローシューターではあるものの、「シューター」という部分にあまりフォーカスしておらず、近接戦闘やアビリティによるエリアの制圧を軸としたキャラクターが多いです。キャラによってはメイン攻撃以外に4～5種類ほどのアビリティを使い戦うキャラクターもおり(OWは各キャラ2～3種類)、シューティングの色味よりも多様なアビリティを駆使したチームバトルというほうが正しいでしょう。(ことアビリティの効果内容に関しては、OWや他FPSを参照したものも多いですが、そこはOWが築いたものがデカすぎるため真似るのは仕方ないことで…)

アビリティの存在感が強い一方で、アルティメットスキルに関しては、直接的なキル・エリア制圧につながる程破壊力のあるものは少なく、一部キャラを除いて性能的には控えめな印象です。(破壊力のあるアルティメットをもつ一部キャラは通常時の火力が取りにくかったり、アビリティが少々控えめにデザインされていると感じました。)

また、スキルセット(キャラの持つアビリティの組み合わせ)にも差異があります。OWにおける各キャラクターのアビリティは、キャラの立ち回りのデザインモデルありきで、それに合わせた性能のアビリティとなっているものが多いです。例えば、フランカーのスキルセットであれば<ブリンク>+<防御行動>のスキルセット、ベイトタンクであれば<ダメージカットやバリア>+<チャージやスラム>といった具合です。このようにOWは「このキャラクターはこういう立ち回りが強い」という、キャラの行動モデルに対応したスキルセットになっています。

一方で本作では良くも悪くもごった煮状態です。例えば、本作のマンティスというキャラのスキルセットは<CCスキル(スリープ)>+<自己強化>+<味方回復>+<味方強化>+<連携スキルで自己蘇生>+<パッシブで自分の移動速度向上>といった具合で、とにかく多岐雑多かつてんこ盛りです。キャラによってはマーベルコンテンツ上での原作デザインを優先し、若干シナジーの薄いアビリティを持っていたり(近接格闘主体なのに4段ジャンプがある、ヒールロールなのにバローができる…など)、また他と比べてオーバーパワーな性能のアビリティも多くあります。

このアビリティの大盛り感・ごった煮感こそがOWとの最大の差異であると感じます。ひとつのキャラクターの立ち回りがアビリティの切り方によって多岐にわたるという意味では非常に新鮮さを感じるものの、他方ではキャラ間のバランス調整やチーム内でのキャラごとの役割の比重が不安定であることにもつながりますし、競技シーンのようなシビアなプレイングにおけるノイズになったり、またはいわゆる「腐る」アビリティが出る可能性もあります。



派手。とにかくド派手です。ヒーローもののゲームとしては大正解で、マーベルファンとしては大変喜ばしいものですが、一方でシビアなプレイを求められる競技シーンなどではマイナス要素になりかねません。加えて、アビリティの範囲が分かりにくかったり、エフェクトが大きすぎてブラインド状態になる等もあります。各行動時のサウンドも派手でかっこいいのですが、その音のせいで敵の足音が聞こえにくいのも玉に瑕です。

この部分に関しては賛否が分かれると思います。私のようなカジュアルなプレイヤーならば本作のド派手な演出は大いに楽しめると思いますし、一方でシビアな競技シーンを楽しむ人々にとってはノイズとなる要素です。OWとの比較としては、本作はマーベルヒーローゲームとしての没入感に、OWは競技シーンを見据えたシビアさに寄り添っているという印象を抱きました。



本作はやはりマーベルヒーローたちの作品だからでしょうか、立ち回りに気を付けてさえいれば各キャラが非常にタフです。アビリティやアルティメットに関しても「使えば盤面全体を打開できる」という類のものは少なく、またロールに気を遣いさえすればヒール量が非常に多いため、結果として「一度優勢になったらそれを維持するのが楽」なゲームです。

とはいえ「アルティメットひとつですぐキルが取れない」「ヒール量が多い」といった部分に関してはOWにもそういった調整が施された時期がありますし、OWはそういった環境でもしっかりキルデスの生じるゲームでした。

ではなぜ本作でヘルスが維持しやすく中々キャラが死なないかというと、ブリンク(瞬間移動)、チャージ(突進移動)、フェード(無敵移動)、ブースト(加速移動)のような「その場から離れる」アビリティを持つキャラクターが多すぎることと、そういったキャラクターが「アビリティを使うと追加ヘルスを得る」というパッシブを持っていることが原因と思われます。加えて、一撃でキルを取れるDPSも基本的にはおらず(ホークアイは特殊なので除きます)、簡単に言えば「自分も敵も死にそうな時に逃げやすいゲーム」ということです。

勿論、逃げた敵を追いかけるためにそれらの移動アビリティを使うこともできますし、それが唯一の打開点になることが多いですが、追撃とはつまり「逃げる手段を消費して敵陣に突っ込む」わけなので当然リスクが大きい行動です。そのリスクを負ってまで打開したいのは常に負けている側のチームであり、勝っている側はリスクを負わずに安全な押し引きに徹することができてしまいます。つまり「一度拠点を取られたらずっと不利」となります。

この「逃げる相手を追いかけてキルを取る」すなわちチェイス行動の駆け引きを比較的安全に行えるのが、ヘルスの多いタンクロールです。ベイトやフロントの死守のためにヘルスをぶつけるOWのタンクとは異なり、負けている場面では「ヘルスを犠牲にして敵を追いかけてどうにかキルをとって帰ってくる」という行動が目立ちます。(オープンベータでは「タンクがやわらかい」という意見が見受けられましたが、おそらくこういったチェイスをする場合タンクのヘルスが犠牲になり、一方でチェイスをあきらめたとて敵が減らず結局フロントにいるタンクの被弾が増えるためでしょう。ただし、タンクがリスクを負わずフロントにいさえすればヒール量の多さで死にはせず、やはり硬直状態に陥りがちといえます。)

マーベルヒーローがゲーム中に何度も頓死するというのは爽快感に欠けるものの、タフすぎてもゲームの大局的な盛り上がりに欠けたり、状況打開を狙った挙句にスノーボール(接近乱戦になって何が何だかわからずにキル/デスが生じてしまう)が起きやすくなるもので、一長一短ではあると思います。ここら辺のバランス調整に関しては本作とOWの思想の違いが見受けられました。




*************************
以上3つの差異を並べたうえで、「同じゲームルールであってもOWとは完全に異なるゲーム性である」というのが私個人の感想です。
バランス面やアクション・演出の明瞭性など競技シーンとの相性に関わる面については、OWや他タイトルが長年かけて培ってきたものには未だ及ばないと感じる一方で、純粋に「派手なヒーローバトルを楽しむ」という面においては、他と比べても本作は群を抜いて魅力度的であると思います。
ブランド戦略を競技シーンに頼ってきたこれまでのヒーローシューターと同じようにシビアな調整を施す路線で行くのか、はたまた大味さや派手さを活かしてカジュアルな楽しさを優先するのか、今後の調整次第で本作がどうなるかはわかりませんが、私個人としては、マーベルライバルズが独自の方向性を確立し、ド派手で楽しいゲームであり続けてほしいと切に願います。

Por que o primeiro andar, sempre chega quem está desesperado, mija fora do vaso e etc…

This game ♥♥♥♥♥ and it ♥♥♥♥♥ good. Even just in the menus its oozes with alot of personality with pop up renders of the characters like they're jumping into action out of a comic panel.

Gameplay is very much like any class or hero shooter with each character feeling unique from each other even if they play effectively the same role, very little overlap between them. Most have a niche to fill

Game looks with amazing models that are their own style but still reminiscent of comics, silhouettes are easy to spot out so you know who you're looking at from a distance. I also love the mini stories of each map, while its well and good to have it be told by two elements of gameplay like in other games, its great to see small intros and outros showing the outcome of winning or losing.

So far I'd say the game is solid, balance is never perfect but nothing screams as a pure buzzkill and its monetisation is great! It doesn't make you pay for its hero pool like lesser games in the F2P sphere :)

Am Anfang hat mir Marvel Rivals wirklich gut gefallen. Abwechselungsreiche Charaktere mit Wiedererkennungswert. Ein guter Overwatch (oder wenn wir ehrlich sind: ein guter Team Fortress) Clon.

Leider scheitert für mich das Spiel am gleichen Problem, das schon Team Fortress (eingeschränkt) und Overwatch (verstärkt) hat: Das Matchmaking ist absolut mies.

Ich hatte jetzt 8 Spiele mit Niederlagen hintereinander. bei 6 der Spielen hatte mein Team nicht den Hauch einer Chance. Klar kann mal passieren, aber bei einer durchschnittlichen Spielzeit von sagen wir mal 20 Minuten pro Partie saß ich damit fast 1 1/2 Stunden in Partien fest, die nicht mal im Ansatz Spaß gemacht haben.

Dabei hatte ich vorher echt tolle Partien mit viel Spannung und knappen Ergebnissen. Aber solange niemand das Problem des absolut gestomped werdens und der dazu gehörigen Frustration löst werde ich das 6v6 Genre für mich leider meiden. Dafür gibt es für mich zu viele andere tolle Genres.

If you ever wonder how Overwatch still has a consistent playerbase despite its negative reception, it's because of its solid core gameplay foundations.

Marvel Rivals is very similar to that aspect of Overwatch. Whether that is good or not, up to you. Fun, intuitive navigation, quick matches - all in the flavor of the Marvel IP. Add the unique addition of team combo activations, it's a cool recipe for a game.

What will decide the fate of this game is its management and the frequency of (reasonable) updates. Play it while it's fun. It's free! And you get all available heroes at the start.

Amazing game! Feels a lot better to play than Overwatch! The art is gorgeous, the animations are fire! A huuuuge champion pool on release. Queue time is nonexistent, you jump straight in and have fun! Active and growing community. Never had any connection or stability issues. The game seems pretty well optimised! BEST PART IT'S ABSOLUTELY FREE TO PLAY! WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? Just pick the game up and have fun!

I am a big PC Overwatch player (both original and 2) and I find this game to be quite fun. The high level design is very Overwatch-like in terms of map objectives and the three main archetypes for heroes. There are also some hero mechanics that feel Overwatch inspired but despite some of the similarities between the two games I find Marvel Rivals feels overall quite fresh and unique. The 3rd person view changes the way combat feels in a pretty big way for me. It's less twitchy and a little more MOBA-like (but having decent aim is still important). Additionally I feel they did a great job of capturing the fantasy of each Hero.

All in all, I think there is a lot of room for additional refinement of mechanics and balancing but I find the game to be a great deal of fun. I look forward to seeing how the game evolves.

Rating: 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 (5/5)

Marvel Rivals is an absolute gem for Marvel fans and gamers alike! From the moment you start playing, the attention to detail in the characters, environments, and gameplay mechanics is breathtaking. It feels like stepping directly into the Marvel Universe.

Pros:
Amazing Graphics: The visuals are stunning, with each character looking like they’ve leapt straight out of the comics and movies. The animations are fluid, and the special effects during combat are jaw-dropping.
Engaging Gameplay: The strategic combat system is easy to pick up but offers a ton of depth for those who love mastering their favorite heroes and villains.
Variety of Characters: The roster is huge, featuring iconic characters with unique abilities that stay true to their Marvel lore. Whether you're a fan of Iron Man, Black Panther, or even Loki, there’s a character for everyone.
Co-op and Multiplayer Modes: Playing with friends or challenging others online is an absolute blast! The teamwork mechanics are well-thought-out, making every match feel rewarding.
Immersive Storyline: The story mode is a treat, packed with twists, turns, and epic battles that kept me hooked for hours. Marvel fans will appreciate the nods to iconic story arcs.
Cons:
Honestly, I struggled to find any! Perhaps some minor tweaks could improve matchmaking speed, but that’s a small price to pay for such an incredible experience.

This game truly captures the heart and soul of what makes Marvel so beloved. Whether you're a die-hard fan or just looking for a fantastic game to play, Marvel Rivals is worth every penny. The developers clearly poured their passion into this, and it shows.

Highly recommend it! Excelsior! 🕷️⚡

The game is really good

Marvel Rivals to nowa gra, która z miejsca przyciąga uwagę fanów uniwersum Marvela i miłośników karcianek. Gra stawia na strategiczną rywalizację, łącząc elementy dynamicznej walki z unikalnym podejściem do budowy talii. Rozgrywka opiera się na pojedynkach pomiędzy superbohaterami i złoczyńcami, co pozwala graczom wcielić się w role swoich ulubionych postaci, takich jak Spider-Man, Iron Man czy Loki.

Jednym z największych atutów Marvel Rivals jest różnorodność kart, które oferują zróżnicowane umiejętności i możliwości taktyczne. Mechanika gry jest przemyślana, dzięki czemu każda rozgrywka może być inna i zaskakująca. Interesującym rozwiązaniem są unikalne zdolności postaci, które pozwalają tworzyć zaawansowane kombinacje i zaskakiwać przeciwników.

Graficznie Marvel Rivals prezentuje się świetnie. Ilustracje na kartach są pełne detali i oddają klimat komiksów Marvela, co z pewnością docenią fani.

Chociaż Marvel Rivals to tytuł skierowany głównie do fanów superbohaterów, może również zainteresować graczy, którzy szukają czegoś nowego w świecie karcianek. To ekscytująca propozycja, która łączy dynamiczną rozgrywkę z kultowym uniwersum.

The stories, lore they added to the teams and superheroes are great too.

Has a long way to go

It seems that there haven't been much improvements since the playtests. it's a decently fun game, especially when played with friends but it has a lot of issues that needs ironing out. Right now, I cannot recommend this game in its current state.

Pros:
- Visual style is amazing! The characters, animations and effects are all very flashy yet cohesive.
- Good monetisation so far
- Interesting characters. Decent mix of mainstream and obscure characters
- Some character abilities are pretty unique and is a fresh take compared to other Hero Shooters
- Team up abilities are interesting both from a gameplay and lore perspective.

Cons:
- Poor optimisation. Lots of frame drops and sometimes the game just feels sluggish
- Poor hit feedback. Most characters don't have impact sounds on hit and unless you're paying attention to enemy health bars closely, it's sometimes difficult to tell if you've actually landed a hit.
- Poor audio mixing. Settings don't cover all parts of the game and certain parts are extremely loud when compared to others.
- Voice lines give me secondhand embarrassment and most voice overs don't stand out.
- Character movement is floaty and some heroes have way too many movement abilities when some of them could've been made into passives and less complex.
- Maps are beautiful to look at but uncomfortable to traverse through. It feels like it would've suited a singleplayer game more.
- Needs better visual indicators for some enemy abilities



So yeah, even though I had fun, there are parts of the game I find very dissatisfying and frustrating. Right now it feels like a 'Flavour of the Month' game than something I'd be playing long term. I do want this game to succeed and hopefully they iron out all these issues soon.

Back to 2017.

Not gonna lie, I expected a lot more from this game, especially with all the hype from content creators. The biggest issue is definitely the gameplay—it feels more like a pre-alpha build than a polished product.

Right now, I can’t recommend it as a main hero-based shooter. It’s chaotic and can be fun for a game or two, but the sluggish mechanics and rough edges quickly dull the experience. Maybe after some updates and improvements, my opinion will change, but in its current state, it’s just not there yet.

Though credit where credit’s due—it launched with a massive hero roster, stunning maps, and some truly interesting character designs. The characters are unique while still being instantly recognizable, which is no small feat.

Yaklaşık 20 saatlik deneyim sonucum olarak, Overwatch 2, Valorant ve benzeri türdeki oyunlara karşı bir ilginiz varsa, sisteminiz de ortalama bir sistem ise, marketinde yalnızca BattlePass veya kozmetik ürünler bulunan bu oyunu deneyimlemeniz gerektiğini belirtebilirim. Zaten bu oyunları daha önceden deneyimlemişseniz iyice oyuna hakim bir şekilde başlıyorsunuz. Bir de bunun üzerine Marvel evrenine hayranlığınızın bulunuyorsa, kesin kaçırmayın. İçerik bakımından en çok Overwatch 2'ye benzediği söylenebilir. Muhtemelen Overwatch 2'yi tahtından etmeye başlamış olduğunu da oyuncu istatistiklerine bakarak gözlemleyebiliriz.

+ Vuruş hissiyatı mükemmel
+ Karakter ve harita tasarımları görsel olarak yeterli düzeyde
+ Şu an için herhangi bir P2W içeriğe sahip olmaması
+ Sürekli yeni stratejiler üretmen gereken ekip birleşim olayları

-Yetersiz oyun modu (Yeni çıkmış olduğu için oldukça normal)
-Anlık FPS ve ses sorunları

Rakip oyunlarına kıyasla rahat bir şekilde oynanabilir. Yeni görüşlerim oldukça yorumu güncelleyeceğim. En yukarıda bırakmış olduğum Discord davet linki ile Türkiye Topluluğu oluşturduğumuz sunucuda takım arkadaşları bulabilirsiniz.

Problem

So. I have been encountering issues with Marvel Rivals. While my ping on NA servers is fine (30-60ms), running Diagnostics results in Connection Errors. The game disconnects me either when queuing for a match or at the end of one. Looking at my match history, half of them show as "Not Completed" even though I played through the entire match.

- Firewall is already allowed (this happens automatically with new game installations, which prompt to create an exception)
- No blocks shown on Defender AV
- Already validated files (Note: this only checks if all files are present)
- Reinstalled game
- My initial checking in DNS revealed one domain was blocked: who.nie.easebar.com

I've never encountered this before. The only explanation I can think of is that NetEase/Rivals might be attempting something more concerning than expected—such as ads, trackers, disguised third-party tracking, additional fingerprinting, malware/phishing distribution, cryptojacking, or IDN Homograph Attacks—and my DNS protection or ISP is blocking it. I've reached out to their Discord bot for assistance but don't seem to be going anywhere and when I tried to follow-up with questions it repeats the Auto-Reply.


You're likely using default DNS settings from your ISP or Google with no additional security. I switched mine to Google DNS and now the network diagnostics is working. My NextDNS is blocking the connection because one or more of these security features I have enabled:


- Domain Generation Algorithms (DGAs) Protection
- Threat Intelligence Feeds
- Google Safe Browsing
- Cryptojacking Protection
- IDN Homograph Attacks Protection
- Typosquatting Protection
- Domain Generation Algorithms (DGAs) Protection


I've identified an issue. is being blocked by . Allowing this fixed the Network Diagnostics.

I'm still seeing being blocked. Since I've only noticed this DNS while playing Marvel Rivals, I suspect the game is using this service. Since its purpose isn't clear and seems unrelated to the game's core functionality, I've kept it blocked.

I added and to my Allowlist, which essentially allows all their required connection attempts. However, I continued experiencing the same issues with joining matches and disconnecting at the end. I'm unsure how many security exceptions I need to make in my DNS settings to get this game working properly. Without more details about the required connections and their purposes, I can't determine if compromising my security settings is worthwhile. For now, I've decided to uninstall the game.

Pros:
-Free to play
-Beautiful art style
-Marvel IP
-Great voice acting
-FUN
-Heavily populated, finding a match takes .2 seconds

Cons:
-Some heroes have a steep learning curve

-Doctor Strange portal tanks frames


Overall:
It feels like Overwatch back at the beginning when it was fresh and fun. This is the most successful attempt at a 6v6 hero shooter since that time, imo. It's free so you have no reason not to give it a try.

Sicuramente un genere non nuovo, l'impasto è Overwatch diciamocelo, ma sicuramente ciò che contraddistingue questo gioco oltre al fatto che sia a tema MARVEL, è l'unicità che sono riusciti a dare a un genere già esistente.

Ho giocato Overwatch al day one nel 2016, per poi vederlo fallire nel 2018 e crollare totalmente quando uscì Overwatch 2, ma Marvel Rivals seppur ripeto, una base di Overwatch ha quel tocco in più e quella cura che non si sono mai visti in questo genere. Ci tengo a precisare che sto recensendo il gioco a 2 giorni dopo l'uscita, e sono consapevole che arriveranno una marea di bilanciamenti che cambieranno/rovineranno molti eroi (spero non il gameplay).

Il gioco in se è molto divertente, e i personaggi dispongono di molte skills e combinazioni tra personaggi. Lato grafico e artistico non mi dispiace questa grafica fumettosa, anche perché ormai a parer mio i modelli pongosi hanno annoiato. Attualmente il gioco presenta alcuni difettucci di lag e crash improvvisi, ma niente di grave.

La cosa che spero è che gli sviluppatori non si facciano accecare dai soldi e mantengano il gioco giocabile e bilanciato, perché da recensione positiva a negativa è un attimo, ed è un attimo far fare questo gioco la fine di Overwatch. Ho giocato a Marvel Snap, e posso dire che lì si sono fatti accecare dai soldi, staremo a vedere qui cosa succederà (non sono fiducioso)

I only played this game a short amount of time, but within my first few sets, there were major game design issues plaguing every aspect. I think they need to put this game back in the oven for a year or two. These issues all compound upon each other, making them worse than the sum of its parts:

1. The maps are outrageously small and have very minimal flank routes

2. Half the characters in the game don’t even have to aim or are purely melee, which feels terrible to fight. Those that do have to aim like who I played, Psylocke, would struggle to ever miss a shot in the first place with the molasses slow movement speed. I basically never missed

3. Kills feel unsatisfying and not very impactful, even when I landed cool combos with my combo character. The respawn timer seems really fast

4. Your ultimates and abilities don’t go away on death, meaning they’re heavily spammable. Imagine if medic’s Uber didn’t reset on death.

5. Healing is massively overturned, and the characters have huge health pools, even the squishy ones. Immortality fields, self healing tied to hitting opponents (with limited aiming needed), and the raw numbers of healing are all insane.

One or two of these issues could've been okay, but all combined it makes for a slog where it's nearly impossible to isolate a player on their own, and miserable to try to kill anyone that doesn't overextend, with absolutely no reason to over extend. The trench warfare of video games. Build up your ult, regardless of if you live or die, and try to break the stalemate with it, and even then they'll come back pretty quick.

GREAT GAME! Seriously no joke I like the game but I can't recommend it until major/minor thing are fixed. I think they need to take a look at their voice system. I've played a TON of games within my 9 hours and have not had one person speak even though it says everyone joins the voice chat channel at the start of the game.. All my audio settings are fine (Voice Chat Enabled) and should be working correctly but yet not one person speaks? That's hard to believe. The balancing of characters definitely needs work. 90% of matches seem to be one sided. A role queue for at least competitive mode would be very helpful for that. I do plan to keep playing periodically but its hard for me to want to get into this game when this stuff needs to be addressed.

The game is super fun at it's core, while I think that brawlers got much much more love than strategists or vanguards I still see a very fun game. However, that fun game is underneath the myriad of technical and performance issues. I had to struggle to get the game to run at a smooth frame rate and half the time it tanks to nothing anyways during team fights or just because. The game becomes unplayable at this point and as a support main I end up getting my team killed and then we all have to take the 5 hour walk of shame back because my game dropped to 0 fps when everyone ulted on point. The only thing that meets the minimum requirements is my CPU which is a Ryzen 1600x. Everything else is far above the minimum requirements. I'm not sure why I would be having these problems a the lowest graphical fidelity possible, with nothing else but the game running on my computer.

In it's current state I can't reccomend the game unless you are part of the lucky group who doesn't have these problems.

Overall this has been a fun game to play with friends, however the abysmal performance and farcical destructible environment significantly undermines the game play experience. You'll quickly realize that the best maps are the ones with fewest destructible objects, simply because your frame rate won't be suffering as much.

Not only do the destructible objects tank performance they re-build after a little while; so what was the point in the first place??? It adds nothing to the game play and in fact actively makes everything worse.

The general performance and optimization of this game is downright abysmal. Get ready for single digit FPS drops as soon as a Dr. Strange opens a portal, someone breaks a large destructible object, or too many people hit buttons at the same time. All while not even utilizing 100% of your hardware.

Grafikler ve Görsel Sunum
Marvel Rivals, görsel anlamda oldukça tatmin edici bir deneyim sunuyor. Karakterlerin tasarımı, Marvel evreninin ikonik tarzına sadık kalınarak özenle yapılmış. Iron Man, Spider-Man, Thor, Captain America gibi kahramanların yanı sıra, kötü karakterler de etkileyici bir şekilde modellenmiş. Bu karakterler, oyun sırasında detaylı animasyonlarla hareket ediyor ve her biri, kendine has hareketleriyle dövüşlere katılıyor. Özellikle karakterlerin özel yetenekleri ve saldırılarındaki görsel efektler oldukça dikkat çekici.

Dövüş alanları da son derece detaylı ve dinamik bir şekilde tasarlanmış. Marvel evreninden tanıdık yerler, her savaşta oyuncuları farklı atmosferlerde mücadele etmeye davet ediyor. Ancak, tüm bu görsel zenginlik bazı optimizasyon problemleri ile gölgelendiği için, görselliği ile büyüleyen oyun zaman zaman donma, takılma ve performans kayıpları yaşatabiliyor.

Optimizasyon Sorunları
Marvel Rivals’ın en büyük eksiği, optimizasyon konusunda yaşadığı sıkıntılardır. Oyun, grafiksel olarak güçlü ve detaylı bir yapıya sahip olsa da, bu yoğun görsel unsurlar bazen oyun performansını olumsuz yönde etkileyebiliyor. Özellikle büyük savaşlar sırasında, ekranın çeşitli köşelerinde patlamalar, karakter hareketleri ve animasyonlar yoğunlaşarak, düşük kare hızları ve takılmalar yaşanmasına yol açabiliyor. Bu, oyuncunun odaklanmasını zorlaştırmakta ve dövüşlerdeki tepkilerini yavaşlatmaktadır.

Daha güçlü bilgisayar sistemlerinde bu sorunlar daha az hissedilse de, yine de zaman zaman optimizasyon eksiklikleri gözlemlenebiliyor. Yüksek çözünürlükte oynarken, grafik yoğun sahnelerde ve karakter animasyonlarında yaşanan düşüşler, oyunun akışını kesiyor ve oyuncuların tepkilerini etkiliyor. Özellikle hızlı refleksler gerektiren bir nişancı oyununda, bu tür performans sorunları büyük dezavantajlar yaratabiliyor.

Oynanış ve Karakter Dengelemesi
Marvel Rivals, takım tabanlı bir nişancı oyunu olarak her karakterin kendine özgü yetenekleri ve dövüş tarzları ile dikkat çekiyor. Oyuncular, takımlarını kurarken, her bir karakterin güçlü ve zayıf yönlerini göz önünde bulundurarak strateji oluşturmak zorunda. Karakterler, uzak mesafeden ateş edebilme, yakın dövüş yapabilme, savunma yapabilme gibi çeşitli yeteneklere sahip.

Örneğin, Captain America, güçlü savunma yetenekleriyle takımına koruma sağlarken, Black Widow hız ve çevikliğini kullanarak düşmanlarına pusu kurabiliyor. Iron Man ise uzun menzilli lazerlerle rakipleri hedef alırken, Hulk gibi karakterler yakın dövüşte çok güçlü olabiliyor. Her karakterin dövüş tarzı, oyunculara farklı stratejiler uygulama olanağı tanıyor ve takım oyunu gereksinimini ön plana çıkarıyor.

Ancak, burada karşılaşılan optimizasyon sorunları, özellikle hızlı ve yoğun dövüşlerde oyuncuların tepkilerini etkileyebiliyor. Animasyonlar ve karakter hareketleri arasında yaşanan takılmalar, özellikle nişan alma ve atış hızında sıkıntılar yaratıyor. Bu, bir nişancı oyununda oldukça önemli bir sorun, çünkü doğru zamanlamalar ve hedefleme, başarı için kritik.

Çevrimiçi Oyun ve Sunucu Stabilitesi
Marvel Rivals, çevrimiçi bir PvP oyunudur ve sunucu stabilitesi, oyuncuların deneyimini doğrudan etkileyen bir faktördür. Bu oyunda, 5v5 maçlar oldukça heyecanlı ve rekabetçi olsa da, zaman zaman sunucu problemleri yaşanabiliyor. Oyuncular, bazen bağlantı kopmaları, gecikmeler veya sunucu hatalarıyla karşılaşabiliyorlar. Bu durum, özellikle stratejik planlama ve hızlı reflekslerin önemli olduğu bir nişancı oyununda büyük sorun teşkil ediyor.

Bağlantı sorunları, oyun sırasında karakterlerin hareketlerini ve atışlarını etkileyebilir, bu da oyuncunun oyun içindeki performansını düşürebilir. Yavaş veya kesilen bağlantılar, maçların dengesini bozarak oyunculara dezavantaj yaratabiliyor. Bu, oyuncuların maçlarda adil bir deneyim yaşamasını engelliyor ve sunucu tarafındaki iyileştirmelere olan ihtiyacı vurguluyor.

Sonuç: Potansiyeli Büyük, Ama Optimizasyona İhtiyaç Var
Marvel Rivals, Marvel evreninin kahramanlarını ve kötü karakterlerini bir araya getiren heyecan verici bir takım tabanlı nişancı oyunu. Görsel açıdan etkileyici ve strateji gerektiren dövüş mekaniği ile oyunculara eğlenceli bir deneyim sunuyor. Ancak, oyun önemli optimizasyon eksiklikleri ve çevrimiçi bağlantı sorunlarıyla karşılaşıyor. Bu, oyun deneyimini sık sık olumsuz etkiliyor.

Daha güçlü sistemlerde bile yaşanabilen takılmalar ve düşük kare hızları, özellikle hızlı refleksler gerektiren nişancı oyunlarında büyük bir dezavantaj yaratıyor. Sunucu problemleri ve bağlantı kopmaları da, çevrimiçi deneyimi zorluyor. Eğer geliştirici ekip bu teknik sorunları çözebilirse, Marvel Rivals kesinlikle daha iyi bir oyun deneyimi sunabilir.

Marvel hayranları için hala oldukça keyifli bir deneyim sunan bu oyun, doğru optimizasyon ve stabilite güncellemeleri ile potansiyelini daha iyi gösterebilir. Ancak şu an için, Marvel Rivals’ı oynarken teknik aksaklıklar ve performans problemleriyle başa çıkmak gerektiğini unutmamak lazım.

По всем пунктам
Оптимизация 7/10 - В требованиях игры всё указано. Для игры, которая является шутером требования высокие, но с конфигурацией ryzen 5 5600, gtx 1660s, ddr4 3200 на минимальных настройках в full hd 80-110 фпс, довольно хорошо, но хотелось бы немного больше оптимизации.
Гейм дизайн 8/10 - Сюда отнесу дизайн уровней, персонажей и UI/UX. Дизайн уровней выполнен хорошо в плане визуального аспекта, но не в плане баланса. Есть относительно проблемные места на картах, но в целом это мелочи. К дизайну персонажей вопросов нет. Все сделаны и выглядят хорошо. UI/UX тоже всё хорошо. Всё меню, интерфейс выполнены хорошо и сразу можно понять что куда нажимать, что произойдет при нажатии на ту или иную кнопку.
Баланс 6/10 - Некоторые герои по ощущениям сильно урезаны, некоторые в свою наоборот довольно сильные. Баланс хоть и присутствует, но при встрече таких героев возникают ощутимые проблемы у игроков с более слабыми персонажами. В этот пункт пожалуй отнесу невозможность игры по ролям, что довольно сильно портит ощущения от игры.
Технические аспекты 5/10 - Регистрация попаданий присутствует, но далеко не в идеале. Звук, как например шаги просто паршивый. Слышишь шаги и не понимаешь, где же источник этого звука. Осознание того, откуда же исходит этот звук приходит после смерти от фланкера. Помимо этого есть еще и другие технические проблемы у игры.

В общем и целом рекомендовать игру можно. Игрокам овервотча, которые любят марвел поиграть точно стоит. По общей оценке поставил бы 6/10, но без исправления звуков шагов, небольшой оптимизации в виде прироста производительности в игре на 15-20%, исправления балансовых аспектов и еще некоторых вещей - игре точно долго с большим онлайном не прожить

Parte de una iniciativa con el típico "trabajo en equipo" y comienzas con 1 afk como de costumbre, 4 dps porque no creas que van a tener el intelecto o comprensión de intentar dar un mejor resultado en la composición.

Requisitos:




Podemos concluir que más que un juego es un simulador de terapia fallida si vamos al caso, uno se desconecta, otro te toxiquea por el micro muy saturadamente, spammean comandos de diálogos siendo su "único aporte". PERO aprendes una gran lección de vida después de todo TRABAJAR EN EQUIPO CON GENTE QUE ODIAS (siendo así que solo los ves durante tus partidas).

¿Es frustrante? Sí. ¿Tóxico? Creo que no hace falta que te lo diga. ¿Adictivo? Como el café: aunque te queme y te ponga nerviosito, no podes dejarlo.

Из плюсов, игра динамичная, яркая, со своими геймплейными решениями. Очень хорошо реализованы порталы и синергия персонажей. Неплохо сбалансированы карты.
Теперь о минусах. Оптимизация: заявлена в рекомендованных видеокарта RTX 2060 super, в чистой теории при наличии данной видеокарты FPS должен держаться на высоких или около ультра настройках в значении 60 с не большими просадками в тяжёлых сценах без включения DLSS. Так же можно предположить что модель RTX 2060 для ноутбуков (не MAXQ) должна показывать высокий FPS на средних настройках, но на своем опыте могу сказать, НЕТ, FPS скачет от 15 до 55 даже на низких настройках и это в спокойных сценах, чтоб нормально поиграть, нужно выставить средние настройки, поставить lumins на низкие настройки (потому что отключить их не возможно), включить DLSS в режим качество или сбалансированный (хотя всё равно FPS толком не меняется, просто становиться стабильнее), затем включаем генерацию кадров от AMD (у кого RTX 4060 и выше те могут использовать генерацию кадров nVidea) и тогда fps становиться на отметке 100-115 кадров с просадками до 60 и тогда можно играть, до определённого момента. Через два-три матча куда-то исчезают текстуры высокого разрешения, всё становиться мыльным и сразу же падает FPS. Также есть проблемы с балансом персонажей, но в некоторых моментах нужно просто понять как играть на том или ином персонаже, так что не критично
Итог:
Геймплейно и визуально хорошая игра, даже с немного проблемным балансом, но из-за оптимизации заявленные "рекомендованные" параметры ПК являются не верными и даже 4060 не может быть указана как рекомендованная, так как уже есть обзоры в steam где пользователи говорят о просадках FPS на 4060. Так что, пока не поправят проблемы с оптимизацией могу поставить только 6/10, так как играть в игру больно физически.

Llevo 4 partidas:

Los gráficos están buenardos (se puede destruir parte del escenario), buena jugabilidad y lo mejor... sin DEI, lo repito, sin DEI (o chorradas progres estilo Concord). Buenos diseños de personajes, es decir, recomendable.

Marvel Rivals hat sich offensichtlich stark von Overwatch inspirieren lassen – von den Charakterfähigkeiten bis hin zu den Spielmodi ist die Ähnlichkeit unverkennbar. Doch wie man so schön sagt: Lieber gut kopiert als schlecht erfunden. Trotz dieser Parallelen macht das Spiel eine Menge Spaß und bietet eine willkommene Abwechslung, vor allem für Spieler wie mich, die mit über 150+ Stunden in Overwatch eine gewisse Ermüdung gespürt haben. Marvel Rivals ist nicht perfekt, aber es ist ein guter Start.

Was gefällt mir?
Die Grafik ist wirklich gelungen. Die Charaktermodelle sind detailliert und die Fähigkeiten passen hervorragend zu den Marvel-Helden, was Fans der Franchise sicher begeistern wird. Besonders gut finde ich die Synergie-Boni: Bestimmte Charakterkombinationen im Team geben kleine, aber spürbare Vorteile, was eine spannende taktische Tiefe hinzufügt.

Auch die täglichen und langfristigen Missionen motivieren zum Weiterspielen und Leveln. Zwar ist die Auswahl an freischaltbaren Items (Skins, Emotes, etc.) derzeit noch recht überschaubar, aber das könnte sich mit Updates und Events deutlich verbessern. Der Battlepass ist "okay", aber im aktuellen Zustand bietet er noch zu wenig Umfang, um wirklich zu überzeugen.

Wo gibt es Probleme?
Ein großes Manko sind die Klassenbeschränkungen beim Start eines Matches. Es gibt keine Zwangsrollen wie Heiler oder Tanks, was oft dazu führt, dass ein Team nur aus Damage Dealern und Tanks besteht. Das Ergebnis: unorganisiertes Chaos. Viele Spieler behandeln Marvel Rivals wie Call of Duty und rennen wahllos über die Map, ohne auf die Ziele zu achten. So entstehen frustrierende Matches, bei denen zielorientiertes Spielen fast unmöglich wird. Hier hätte man aus den Fehlern von Overwatch lernen können.

Das Matchmaking braucht ebenfalls dringend Verbesserungen. Es gibt oft unausgeglichene Matches, was vor allem neuen Spielern den Einstieg erschweren könnte.

Fazit:
Trotz der Schwächen macht Marvel Rivals wirklich Spaß – vor allem, wenn man ein Team hat, das als solches spielt. Die taktischen Möglichkeiten, insbesondere durch die Synergien der Helden, geben dem Spiel eine eigene Note. Mit etwas Arbeit am Matchmaking, mehr freischaltbaren Inhalten und einer stärkeren Fokussierung auf Teamplay könnte Marvel Rivals ein echter Konkurrent zu Overwatch werden.

Für mich ist es jedenfalls eine tolle Abwechslung, die ich sehr genieße. Spiele wie Team Fortress oder Paladins waren für mich nie eine echte Alternative, sei es wegen der veralteten Mechanik oder der Spielerbasis. Marvel Rivals füllt diese Lücke überraschend gut und zeigt, dass es noch Platz für Innovation im Helden-Shooter-Genre gibt.

It’s fun but it’s a gimmick. It’s not balanced at all and it likely never will with 30+ hero’s. Third person works because there’s 20,000 abilities going around at any given time.

For what it is it’s fun, but if I’m not playing with friends I’m not playing. The whole gameplay model revolves around poking for ults and then completely getting wiped out by the broken ults in the game.

Finally, the worst of it all. Nobody uses VC. In Rivals, to unlock your full hero you need to rely on your team picking specific players or else you can lose some abilities. Like I said, it’s fun but I cannot recommend the game. A game that I wouldn’t play on my own is not a game I would suggest to others.

Сыграл я значится в эту игру и хз если честно.
Мне никогда не нравилось играть от третьего лица в подобных играх, здесь тоже.
Персонажей вроде много, но из них половина какие-то непонятные, другие просто не нравятся, еле как выбрал так сказать "мейна". За танков вообще не хочется играть, геймплей слишком медленный, за саппортов не играл, поэтому сказать ничего не могу.
Стиль игры на любителя, кому-то понравится, кому-то нет. Мне лично нормально, глаза не режет, хоть и не привычно.
Игры проходят достаточно быстро, в районе 2-5 минут максимум (по крайней мере у меня). Изучать персонажей и их способности интересно и есть интересные механики у каждого из персонажей (У Логана например есть так называемая 'ярость' которая накапливается с нанесённым противникам уроном), и в принципе каждый уникален сам по себе. Так же можно собирать команды так, чтобы они давали друг другу бонусы.
Цены на скины – конские. Скин Логана из "Дедпул и Росомаха" ≈1700 рублей, а есть скины и дороже. Пока кастомизации мало, но она по своему хороша.
Могу я рекомендовать эту игру? Да. Можно её сравнивать с Овером? Нет. Ибо Овер всё-таки это командный ШУТЕР, а в Марвел Райвалс шутерной составляющей достаточно мало. И каждая из игр самодостаточная и зацепет человека по-своему. Поэтому не стоит разбрасываться словами "Убийца Овервотч", как было с Deadlock. Deadlock тоже не шутер это моба, но тем не менее его тоже сравнивали с Овервотч и говорили что это его "убийца".
Оцениваю игру в 8/10. Marvel Rivals – это интересная, но неоднозначная игра. С одной стороны, она предлагает захватывающие сражения в формате карточной игры с любимыми персонажами Marvel. Система коллекционирования карт и их улучшения довольно увлекательна, и поиск новых сильных комбинаций держит в напряжении. Графика яркая и стильная, хотя и не поражает реализмом. Звуковое сопровождение тоже на уровне, эффекты ударов и музыкальное оформление хорошо передают атмосферу сражений.

Однако, есть и существенные минусы. Система "free-to-play" достаточно агрессивна. Получение редких карт – настоящий гринд, и без значительных вложений времени или денег прогресс будет очень медленным. Баланс между героями и картами тоже вызывает вопросы, некоторые комбинации ощутимо сильнее других, что может привести к однообразному геймплею.

В целом, Marvel Rivals – это игра, которая может понравиться поклонникам Marvel и карточных игр с приятной графикой. Но готовьтесь к долгому и упорному гринду, и не исключено, что вам придётся потратиться, чтобы получить удовольствие от игры в полной мере. Рекомендую попробовать, но с осознанием возможных недостатков. Моя оценка – 3 из 5 звезд.

looked promising but it has horrible performance, insane balancing and too much clutter on the screen that doesn't even help you understand what's going on (also the destructible environment is not a good gimmick, its just annoying).

Unoptimised Unreal Engine slop with DLSS mandatory to get decent frames. I don't know how they can compete with overwatch at least in competitive play considering overwatch looks cleaner and runs at 300 fps at 1440p max settings. This runs only low with full dlss just barely hitting 144fps being a smushy mess to look at with so much visual clutter.

I run an RTX 3090 and a Ryzen 9 5950x and the TAA era has claimed this game despite the game being fairly good in gameplay.

The formula that made overwatch great was the "less is more" mindset when it comes to abilities, here there's just too much going on it feels a bit too much like league of legends over a hero shooters.

Maybe I'm just jaded, but honestly the Disney 1 liner voice acting formula is getting rather stale, the announcer voice is annoying, and the clutter of everything makes the game overwhelming to play.

DLSS and TAA really ruin the fidelity of games who are trying to make an entry into the gaming industry, and Lumen and Unreal Engine do nothing to solve this. Sad times.

Cons-

1 - This game needs role selection in ranked ASAP. In this state it is no different from quick match. There should be a voting screen like team comps like "1tank 3dps 2 healer or 2 tank 2 dps 2 healer even 1 tank 4dps 1 healer etc."
When people vote for the comp they should choose a role or system make them play the role by assigning and locking the other roles for them.
(This is the biggest reason I gave it a thumbs down. If they change it in the future it goes thumbs up.)

2- Game crashes due to GPU error time to time and this issue is common.

3- There are some bugs like you stuck around occasionally such as playing as wolverine when you use your leap you don't come down when you stuck to a wall and people kill you easily.

4- Healers are too over powered if you formed a 6 people healer team you might win all your matches.

5- Every hero has skills in different buttons it makes swapping to other heroes difficult and getting used to them in one session.

6- To Buy Luxury Battlepass and Extra 1400+20% Chrono Tokens you have to buy 1050 Lattice but you can only buy 1000 for 9,99$ and then you have to make another transaction for 0.99 to buy 100 lattice. I mean why you put us through all these troubles... Bad marketing strategy instant repulse from the transactions of the game.

7- Sometimes you can't figure out which skin is for which character they didn't put a name on them (for example Mantis' battlepass skin) also not many skins to buy right now.

8- Spider-man players who think they are the best and goes 2 kills 25 deaths while holding 1000 damage. They never think of swapping to another. Situational swap means nothing to them they rip off their "H" keys on their keyboards.

Pros+

1- It's Marvel.

2- Art style is quite cool for this type of genre also the UI and menu options are rather minimalist in a way it doesn't disturb your eyes.

3- Huge hero rooster at launch. It will grow even bigger in time.

4- Battle pass progression system seems cool.

5- Probably the best TPS hero shooter right now. (I don't want to compare it to Overwatch because it's FPS and it has a whole different feel.)

6- All heroes are unique in their on way so you never feel like you are playing the same game all the time.

The reason Rivals is free is because Marvel saw what happened to Concord. The art style is good, but the overall gameplay is bad. The character movement speed for normal characters is far too slow, while characters like Spiderman are basically flying around everywhere. So everyone fights over the web-slinging characters. Super moves on some characters are anything but super (AOE attacks are literally the only good ones), attacking an enemy team will only work if your team is perfectly synced and a lack of healers means you lose. Also the team up abilities mean that if a team plays a group of specific supporting characters it makes non-supporting character teams basically useless. The meta will come down to who plays a specific team of specifically linked Heros/Villains well together abusing their special team-up abilities that they win. You can't just make a team for fun and have fun playing as your favourite hero(s) even if you have a good balance of healers and attackers. You have to choose supporting teams only to stand a chance. 4/10

A great Hero shooter and dare I say it, the best in the genre. The gameplay is really fun and exciting, the characters look great, are interesting to learn and master and surely you will find one that match your preference. Team-up abilities, when matched with specific characters (like Hulk and Iron man), are a really cool mechanics to use with your friends. The monetization is really customer friendly, with multiple credits packs range and battlepasses that don't expire after a season if you bought it. You might think that this game is a cheap knock-off of Overwatch 2, but really , it's even better than Overwatch 1. 6v6, huge incentive on hero identity, hero bans and protect when reaching diamond 3 and above in ranked, better monetization practices, open queue and more are what make this game a true sequel to Overwatch 1 and the hero shooter genre as a whole. I highly recommend playing this game. You won't regret it.

Marvel Rivals is a 6v6 player-versus-player, third-person hero shooter title. With the right combination of two or three characters, players can make use of "Dynamic Hero Synergy" which further maximize their playable character's combat efficiency. The game also features destructible environments, allowing players to alter the battlefield (overseen by Galacta) to their advantage.

As of November 2024, 33 playable characters have been officially announced. Additionally, five locations have been confirmed for the game, those being Yggsgard, a fusion of Asgard and Yggdrasil, Tokyo of 2099, the home of the Klyntar, Hydra Charteris Base set in Antarctica and the Intergalactic Empire of Wakanda. The game has three modes: Convoy, Domination, and Convergence.

Плюсы игры:
Картинка.
Жанр.
Герои из марвел.
На этом все. Минусы:
Баланс.
Хотя игра вышла в бета-тест в мае и за пол года можно было понять, что необходимы правки. Из-за того что игра пародирует OW, использует наборы команд из 6 игроков с одной и другой стороны, саппорты в количестве более 1 шт. на команду превращают танков, дпс в неубиваемые цели. Хила настолько много, что 1 саппорт может перехиливать урон от двух персонажей по одному (по предварительному сговору стрелявшим/бившим). Это касается не всех саппортов, но некоторые из них (4 из 6!!!!!!!!!!!) сломаны полностью. В итоге мы видим постоянный пик только из них и конечно же, в команде противника. Играя в соревновательный режим который только что вышел, я за день устал делать по 30-40 килов, давать по 30-40к урона и проигрывать. Знаете почему? Правильно, мои танки и другой дпс (если он один, а не два дополнительных как часто бывает и камнеголовые подпивасы в сореве пикают третьего дпс, потому что "НИХАЧУ ХИЛИТЬ, ХАЧУ УБИВАТЬ") не делают ровным счетом ни .хх.. ера - ни урона, ни убийств.
Оптимизация.
Увы, как сложилось уже по традиции современных гореразрабов, моя RTX3060ti превратилась в дно-карту, которую преследуют дропы фпс, фризы и артефакты, даже в такой игре с мультяшной картинкой, где нет множества углов поверхности. (Да, понимаю что бета версия еще, но камон, игра на мобилку лагает на таком железе?)
Сервера.
Вас может не прогрузить в игру, выкинуть, зависнуть и повесить штраф за покидание матча. Лайк однозначно (нет).

Итог:
Играть пока не советую, нужно дождаться патчей, нерфа хилов, ребаланса героев в целом, оптимизации и подвоза нормальных серверов. Имхо.

P.S. Берите все Локи. Он полностью неубиваемый, может выйти 1 в 2-3 героя получить люлей и телепортироваться. Хилит как не в себя. Самый сломанный герой на данный момент. (Мнение игрока с 1000 часов в OW1 и OW2.)

Meinung:

Marvel Rivals ist ein neuer Free-to-Play, teambasierter Shooter, der über kosmetische Inhalte und einen Battlepass finanziert wird. Ziel ist es, mit einem Team von sechs Spielern auf verschiedenen Karten das jeweilige Matchziel zu erreichen.
Vorwort: Ganz ehrlich, was ich vorab mal betonen möchte: Ich hasse... ich hasse dieses ganze Overwatch-Killer-Geschwafel von irgendwelchen Content-Klickbait-Creatorn. Marvel Rivals ist ein eigenständiges Spiel mit vielen Ähnlichkeiten zu anderen PvP-Shootern – und sind wir mal ehrlich, davon gibt's echt genug und nicht nur Overwatch. Deshalb lasse ich dieses Gerede komplett außen vor und bewerte das Spiel für sich.

Positives:

Charaktere:
Hier kommt echt jeder auf seine Kosten, ob Fan oder nicht. Seien wir mal ehrlich: Hier wurde in jeder Ecke so viel Liebe ins Detail gesteckt, wie ich es schon lange nicht mehr bei einem Spiel gesehen habe. Die Charaktere fühlen sich lebendig an, abwechslungsreich und richtig gut gestaltet. Auch das Gameplay mit ihnen ist ziemlich flüssig.

Battlepass:
Der Battlepass ist echt okay. Für 5 € ein optionales Ding, das für Marvel-Fans oder Kosmetikjäger wie gemacht ist. Ich meine, die Entwickler müssen ja auch irgendwie Geld verdienen. Und das Beste: Niemand wird gezwungen, den zu kaufen. Das Gleiche gilt für die Skins – klar, die sind ziemlich teuer, aber auch hier gilt: Es ist komplett optional, und keiner muss sich genötigt fühlen.

Server:
Können wir bitte mal über die Server reden? Zum Launch lief alles wie geschmiert. Keine Probleme, keine Disconnects, nichts. Auch sonst habe ich nichts gehört, was Verbindungsprobleme betrifft.

Gameplay:
Smoothes Gameplay, und wenn die Entwickler hier und da noch ein bisschen nachjustieren, kann das richtig gut werden. Die Bewegungen fühlen sich flüssig an, auch wenn die Kollisionsabfrage manchmal nicht stimmt. Es wäre auch echt hilfreich, wenn es eine Option gäbe, Crossplay komplett zu deaktivieren und nicht nur über Ranked.
Ganz ehrlich: In einem Shooter ist erzwungenes Crossplay einfach nur eine Zumutung. Maus und Tastatur sind nun mal schneller und genauer, und das ruiniert das Spielerlebnis für PC- und Konsolenspieler gleichermaßen.

Negatives:

Performance:
Hier gibt es leider echt einiges zu bemängeln. Die FPS-Drops sind teilweise verrückt, selbst auf niedrigen Einstellungen. Das macht das Spiel stellenweise zu einer richtigen Qual. Die Entwickler sollten hier echt nochmal ran, um das Spiel auch für Toaster kompatibler zu machen – das würde die Playerbase garantiert vergrößern.

Zusammenfassung:
Marvel Rivals ist ein unterhaltsamer PvP-Shooter mit viel Liebe zum Detail und super flüssigem Gameplay. Die Charaktere sind der Hammer, und die Server haben einen Launch hingelegt, der sich sehen lassen kann. Leider gibt es bei der Performance und dem erzwungenen Crossplay noch große Baustellen. Wenn die Entwickler diese Probleme angehen, könnte das Spiel langfristig echt was reißen.

Bewertung:
7/10

Achei o jogo incrível e um ótimo concorrente contra Overwatch. Os personagens são incríveis, e as gameplays diferenciadas, além de terem personagens que são até semelhantes aos de Overwatch. O único problema é que o jogo deveria ser mais otimizado para a galera que tem PC fraco, algo que o concorrente (Overwatch) tem de sobra. Overwatch é bastante otimizado. Meu PC chega a bater 300 FPS com os gráficos no máximo e, às vezes, 400 FPS. Com tudo no mínimo, eu cheguei a pegar 600 FPS (se não me engano) eu tenho um Ryzen 5 5600GT e uma 4060. Mas, tirando isso, o jogo tem bastante potencial e achei incrível. Estou curtindo bastante a jogatina, principalmente com os amigos, que infelizmente sofrem para rodar o jogo porque ele não tem uma otimização igual ou próxima à de Overwatch. A Unreal Engine 5 é bastante pesada, e espero que a desenvolvedora consiga melhorar essa otimização para a galera de PC mais fraco. De todo modo, o jogo é fantástico e gostei bastante. principalmente dos personagens e heróis e vilões que eu sou bastante apaixonados com heróis e vilões de quadrinhos animados principalmente os da marvel

长话短说。1.反馈：正向反馈和受击反馈几乎为零。举个例子，玩惩罚者架枪几乎都感受不到背后有个猩红女巫给你剔骨，就好像一个三百斤的人一脚踩在棉花上，毫无感觉。2.游戏机制和角色定位：为什么不像ow一样绑职业匹配？游戏中遇到那些动不动就上来面选个输出的玩家，甚至有时候三四个C，这怎么能有游戏体验呢？有些角色明明输出很厉害就非要设计成T，比如奇异博士和3和万磁王；纳摩和铁拳看着就很能抗却不合理地设计成输出。除此之外，我还很好奇黑寡妇这种瘤子英雄设计初衷是什么，射程长伤害高导致玩家毒瘤，光躲在后排或者高点开黑枪。3.优化：我4060ti开中画质也就才一百帧左右，跟朋友玩还时不时丢包，游戏体验很受挫。希望官方正视这些问题，而不是二话不说把重心放在竞技比赛上。

Open game, 5 minute loading screen to "install shaders", click quick-play, enter lobby and my laptop instantly hard crashes before getting to join a team. Full shutdown. Turn on my laptop, enter steam, open Marvel Rivals AND AGAIN another 5 minute loading screen to "install shaders". Play tutorial with no issue, play a quickplay game with no issue, then join the second game and again hard crashes my laptop. AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX with Radeon Graphics 3.30 GHz 16GB RAM (15.4 usable). Can run other newly released AA & AAA titles on medium settings between 50-100 fps with consistent frame-rates, this game's optimisation must be atrocious. Reading on Reddit, many other people with even better PC setups also have the exact same issue.

Китайская копирка оверговна. Будто опять делали гачу на мобилки, но что-то пошло не так.

Оптимизации нет, баланса нет, скилл не нужен, читаков в рейтинге вагон. Больше половины героев просто для галочки, ведь смысла в них ноль. В каждом бою все равно будут вялые ведьмы, зеленые наруто и прочее дерьмо для анскиллов.
В итоге весь геймплей: беги от респа и жми что попало в сторону врагов пока не надоест.
Игруны здесь, кстати, тоже из оверговна - такие же кривые и глупые.

好玩，遊戲平衡做的蠻好的，且每個角色都各有特色，雖然很像鬥陣特功，但玩久了之後會發現還是差很多的，雖然有的時候會被依些很煩的角色技能搞到爆氣，但再想想，當是自己暴虐對方時，誰不是一樣會被搞到爆氣呢。雖說上面說得好像非常好玩，但還是覺得有些地方不太好，像是有些角色的技能做得有點太複雜了，在玩或者看的時候，第一時間肯能會搞不懂是什麼意思，而且技能介紹也寫得不是很清楚，個人希望可以做一個選擇的選項，想看簡介的選簡介按鈕，想了解詳情的選詳情按鈕。目前玩下來似乎還沒有見到最嚴重的問題，就是Bug和外掛，不確定是不是因為遊戲剛出的原因，但至少我現在沒遇過，Bug也是，還沒有看到Bug，不然就是太小或者沒有影響遊玩，所以沒發現。照目前看來一切都非常的好，期待外來的更新，希望會出現更多的配對、英雄、地圖及模式。

是不是以為剛剛說完後讓你想要去下載遊戲了，但我現在要說一個致命缺點，為什麼剛才不說，因為上面是誇獎的部分，再來要說批評的部分。雖然不多，但還是要說一下，現在最致命的缺點就是「缺乏可玩性」，遊戲模式只有兩種，嚴格來講是三種，分為娛樂模式、巡航模式和角逐模式，只有這三種模式而已，所以當你玩久後，可能就會覺得不新鮮，就會感到無聊，這點希望作者之後可以再更新新的模式。

總之看完上面那兩大段，我就統整成一句，就是「非常推薦」

Начну с того, что Овервотч – мусор, а эта игра буквально спасение от всех тех трендов, которыми наполнена современная индустрия. Такого качества исполнения, чудесной оптимизации, оригинальности геймплея, ожидать никто не мог.

Так как дети тиктока, которые перематывают даже 10-секундные видео, дочитать до этого момента физически не способны, начну реальный обзор. Marvel Rivals крайне посредственная игра, которая не заслуживает хайпа. Мне было стыдно читать самые популярные обзоры, потому что они не соответствуют действительности. О какой свежести геймплея идет речь, если лучшее описание для этой игры – "продукт моба-содержащий концентрированный"? Где те люди, которые ловят отвал пятой точки от падения кадровой частоты на 1 деление, когда Marvel Rivals требует минимум RTX 3070 для стабильных 60 кадров без апскейлеров? Куда подевались эксперты, которые жалуются на задержку ввода в Unreal Engine 5, когда в игре неотключаемое TAA сглаживание? Почему никто не пишет, что игра ставит отдельный лаунчер? А что насчет компиляции шейдеров каждый раз при запуске? Я не встретил ни слова про неткод игры, никто не замечает проблем с регистрацией попаданий и телепортацией противников? Как и не замечают "нечитаемый" плоский звук, нестабильную кадровую частоту анимаций противников, несколько типов донатной валюты, боевой пропуск, магазин прямо на главном экране, неадекватные цены на облики для героев (стандартный облик стоит $18, а особые, под которые выделены большие колонки во вкладке магазина, $26), платную смену никнейма. Я мог бы продолжать дальше, но даже несколько из этих пунктов достаточно, чтобы пользователи пошли разносить рейтинг другой игре, в которую они даже не собирались играть.

Итого, игра просто не стоит внимания. Предрекаю, что через пару-тройку месяцев онлайн значительно просядет, а все те, кто побежали строчить обзор в первые минуты выхода, быстро про неё забудут.

For anyone having issues with this frame drops and crashing a few tips:

Drop the Super resolution mode to Ultra performance
Cap your frames to 60
make sure the anti-aliasing is set to your graphics card (crashed out a few times because this auto'd to AMD when I'm using nvidia)
Drop your graphics quality (it's a comp game with cartoon graphics, you don't need this to be ultra).

I made these changes and I've had no issues with memory, frame drops or crashing since.
Overall. its a good game but its not well optimized

So this is basically a worse version of overwatch. I like the concpet and stuff but when playing with a friend, it becomes unbearable. Constant disconnects and bans due to the disconnects which are NOT OUR FAULT. There also isnt a mechanic which forces people to play a certain role which seems nice at first but when everyone is a damage dealer in your team and the other team has all roles like healing covered, it becomes clear who wins the game.
I got dc'ed 3 times in a role and while i was waiting for the 5 minute ban to count down, at 1.20 left, i got hit with another 5 minute ban. as you can tell, it is infuriating. Seems like it only happens when we are in a party which i guess is fine for people who play solo, but in a game like this i think playing with friends really makes a difference.
